name: Kami Bancho
description:
KamiKami is the head of the local delinquent Kami gang, known far and wide as the “gods of hair care.” But one day, the ambitious Nagai burns down the Kami Gang’s clubhouse and shaves KamiKami’s best friend, Kuchihige Kun, destroying his prized mustache. 

It’s revealed that Big Boss Nagai of the Razor Gang did this as a way to send a warning, that hair belonged only to those strong enough to keep it. The weak should live a miserable, bald existence. 

Now KamiKami must defeat Boss Nagai, and put an end to the Razor Gang to protect the happiness and hair of the world! 

Director/Lead Game Designer: Heiwa

Programming: pizza mozarella, Idiology

Narrative Designer: P.Arthur O'Driscoll

Art: Heiwa, DevX

Audio: Idiology

PlayTest/Debugging: Heiwa, pizza mozarella, Idiology, TornadoPro2712
